title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Oct. 2
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Oct. 2
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "S&P 500 behaves in way we haven't seen in decades." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
